author: advaitasaha
content:
Hey <@774033563732541451> , I was just wondering
Is there any benchmarking available for Banderwagon point serialization in `go-ipa`?

author: jsign
content: I don't think so. But can create one quite quickly if that's helpful to you (apart for being useful in general for the repo itself)

author: advaitasaha
content:

Was just trying to benchmark what I wrote in nim, so was looking to compare the results

author: jsign
content: Sure, I'll create one and ping you when ready.

author: jsign
content: You might be interested in the code comments where I explain a bit some important facts about being sure what we're measuring.
